law.catch_line: Merger Or Consolidation Of Savings Banks

text.section: the post office address of the initial principal office of the resulting or surviving corporation in the commonwealth;
the name, residence and post office address of each of the initial trustees or directors and the president, treasurer and clerk of the resulting or surviving corporation;
the fiscal year of the resulting or surviving corporation initially adopted;
the date initially fixed in the by-laws for the annual meeting of the shareholders or members of the resulting or surviving corporation.
